text: Va cun zanonro taloq doded va muhlatason guzast, man' nakuned, ki ʙa nikohi hamsaroni xud — har goh ki mijonason rizojate hosil suda ʙosad — darojand. Kase, ki az sumo ʙa Xudo va ruzi qijomat imon ovarda ʙosad, incunin pand girad. Va in sumoro ʙehtar va ʙa poki nazdiktar ast. Xudo medonad va sumo namedoned
